title: Forecast of nickel consumption worldwide 2015 to 2020
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Consumption in thousand metric tons. In total the number of data points it has is 6.
Overall Consumption in thousand metric tons has increased over the Year.
Consumption in thousand metric tons is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2020.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest Consumption in thousand metric tons, of value 2376.0 was reached at Year 2020
The lowest Consumption in thousand metric tons, of value 1963.0 was reported at Year 2015
